medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric abdominal pain associated with fevers and general malaise.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient woke up yesterday morning with fever and general malaise associated with abdominal pain located to his epigastrium and periumbilical area. The abdominal pain is described as crampy, waxes and wanes, and no aggravating or alleviating factors are recalled.
